posts.post_content:
Slowly picking away at the T207 catchers. 

Please sent scans and price(s).

Looking for the following without creases (nice fronts.)

Adams, Bresnahan, Hartley, Henry, Higgins, Kelly, Kuhn, Lewis (Boston Nat.)

(*Thought I had Higgins but realized it was Miller)

Thanks,

Patrick

Leon, you can delete one of these posts. I was having computer freezing issues.


Thanks,

Patrick

posts.post_title: Picked up a John Henry T207
posts.post_content:
I picked up a John Henry T207.....


Still looking for the following without creases: 

Adams (Cleveland Amer.)
Bresnahan (St. Louis Amer.)
Hartley (N.Y Nat.)
Higgins (Brooklyn Nat.)
Kelly (Pittsburg Nat.)
Kuhn (Chicago Amer.)
Lewis (Boston Nat.) (Either version..dreaming big)



Thanks,

Patrick

Hi Mike,

I sent back an email requesting more details on 2 of the cards.

Let me know.

Thanks again,


Patrick

Hi Mike,

Was out of town yesterday. Sent you an email this morning confirming I will take the T207 we discussed.

Thanks again,

Patrick

Thanks again Mike F. for the neat John Adams Anonymous Factory 25 T207!

Still looking for the following without creases: 

Bresnahan (St. Louis Amer.)
Hartley (N.Y Nat.)
Higgins (Brooklyn Nat.)
Kelly (Pittsburg Nat.)
Kuhn (Chicago Amer.)
Lewis (Boston Nat.) (Either version..dreaming big)



Thanks,

Patrick

Have a few more T207s headed my way.

Still looking for the following T207 catchers:

Hartley (N.Y Nat.)
Higgins (Brooklyn Nat.)
Kuhn (Chicago Amer.)
Lewis (Boston Nat.) (Either version..dreaming big)

Have just four (4) more cards to complete my T207 catcher card run.

Still need the following:

Hartley, Kuhn, Irv Lewis, and Livingston (A on shirt)

Looking for vg/ex condition without creases with clean fronts. 

OK with back damage.

Send scans and asking price to:

[url]vintagecatcher@myfairpoint.net[/url]

Thanks again,

Patrick
